description: System-generated unique identifier for this model-year record, used as the primary key and for downstream joins.
Date-time the record was created or last updated in the source/load process; likely stored as a compact numeric string including milliseconds; confirm timezone and semantics with SME.
Marketing model year associated with the vehicle configuration; may differ from the calendar year of manufacture.
Vehicle model designation describing the specific series or configuration for the make and year; may include body style, drivetrain, or package details.
Manufacturer brand of the vehicle associated with the model year.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a legacy system; used for lineage and cross-system mapping; confirm cardinality and format with SME.
Name of the legacy source table from which this record originated; supports data lineage and reconciliation; likely a system code rather than a human-friendly label; confirm with SME.
